Great! Where are you based?
The more of a selection the better.
Hi Kim sure sounds good.
Sorry for the lengthy message, just wanted to give you all the info I could

I would imagine that times have been tough for you and I think a treat box is a simple way to share some joy! 

I would be extremely grateful and honoured if you decide you would like to try my treats. I look forward to hearing from you, whatever you decide. 

Kim

I realised that salt plays a pivotal role in all of our treats and as more and more customers commented on this, it led me to rebranding myself as Salt and Cake. To launch my new brand, I have been working on what will become my trademark signature box....... The 'Sweet and Salty' box. This box will contain NYC chocolate chip cookies, chocolate cupcakes with a salted caramel centre, smores fudge and popcorn caramel macarons. I will send you a picture of the box which I have created. 

I would love for you to be one of the first exclusive people to sample this box before it's initial release ,with the possibility of a review on your blog. I have been working with food bloggers for the last couple of months and have created some great new relationships through it. I feel working together is hugely important, now more than ever, and of course I will be promoting and shouting about your blog in return. Please let me know your thoughts about this and if we can work something out.

Hi Gus,

My name is Kim Allan and I am the founder of Salt & Cake (formerly Cakes and Crumbs by Kim). I hope you are well and you are your family are keeping safe in these times. 

I have always dreamed of having a career in baking and, last year, I decided I was determined to make that happen. Salt and Cake is my lockdown baby. It is difficult enough to make a small business successful without the added obstacle of a global pandemic. I really need all the help that I can get. 

At Salt and Cake I create unique themed, fully customisable treat boxes (as well as cake of course). From the space inspired Galaxy box to the magical Unicorn box, I love coming up with new concepts and treats to match. This has been hugely popular and I am always working on new ideas and products. After the launch of my NYC chocolate chip cookie, customer feedback was that the hits of salt really elevated them.
